section.title: Configure P/M
section.para: To configure the Project Management (P/M) module, select the "Configure P/M" option. The following screen will appear:
When configuring the P/M module, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to indicate the system is configured to use Projects.

If selected, Project Management functionality will be enabled throughout the system. For example, users will be able to assign Projects to Sales Orders, Quotes, Work Orders, and Purchase Order Line Items. Projects may also be created automatically when new Sales Orders and Quotes are entered. If this option is not selected, Project functionality will be disabled.

varlistentry.term: Automatically create Projects for Sales Orders

listitem.para: Select if you want a new Project to be created automatically every time a new Sales Order or Quote is entered.

When new Projects are created automatically, the Projects assume the number of the Sales Order or Quote which caused their creation. If selected, this functionality applies to newly-entered Quotes and Sales Orders only.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Cancels any configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
Saves the configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
